welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hanford, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful architecture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Hanford has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lemoore NAS (Reeves Field) Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Lemoore NAS (Reeves Field) Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a password is required for access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Visalia Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Visalia Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Corcoran Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Corcoran Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights within the United States.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights to and from Fresno-Chandler Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fresno Air Terminal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fresno Air Terminal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
